biotools.summary: SampleQC is an R package for robust multivariate, multi-celltype, multi-sample quality control for single cell RNA-seq. QC is typically done by looking at univariate measures of experimental quality for each cell (such as library size, number of features observed, mitochondrial proportion), and identifying cells that are outliers in some way (e.g. high mitochondrial proportion or small library size).
